cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5093, Wind River Administrative Site Conveyance Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 150 (Tuesday, August 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. HERRERA BEUTLER:
H.R. 5093.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2
[Page H4489]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Wind River Administrative Site Conveyance Act
